Type.Name: TextAttribute

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TextAttribute extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Describes the text attributes supported

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute BgColor = int32(18)

Docs.summary: The background color. The value is an RGB value of the format "u,u,u"

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute BgFullHeight = int32(9)

Docs.summary: "true" or "false" whether to make the background color for each character the height of the highest font used on the current line, or the height of the font used for the current character.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute BgStipple = int32(20)

Docs.summary: "true" if a GdkBitmap is set for stippling the background color.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute Direction = int32(23)

Docs.summary: The direction of the text, if set. Values are "none", "ltr" or "rtl"

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute Editable = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Either "true" or "false" indicating whether text is editable or not

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute FamilyName = int32(17)

Docs.summary: The font family name

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute FgColor = int32(19)

Docs.summary: The foreground color. The value is an RGB value of the format "u,u,u"

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute FgStipple = int32(21)

Docs.summary: "true" if a GdkBitmap is set for stippling the foreground color.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute Indent = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The number of pixels that the text is indented

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute Invalid = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Invalid attribute

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute Invisible = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Either "true" or "false" indicating whether text is visible or not

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute Justification = int32(24)

Docs.summary: The justification of the text, if set. Values are "left", "right", "center" or "fill"

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute Language = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The language used

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute LastDefined = int32(28)

Docs.summary: not a valid text attribute, used for finding end of enumeration

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute LeftMargin = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The pixel width of the left margin

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute PixelsAboveLines = int32(6)

Docs.summary: Pixels of blank space to leave above each newline-terminated line.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute PixelsBelowLines = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Pixels of blank space to leave below each newline-terminated line.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute PixelsInsideWrap = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Pixels of blank space to leave between wrapped lines inside the same newline-terminated line (paragraph).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute RightMargin = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The pixel width of the right margin

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute Rise = int32(10)

Docs.summary: Number of pixels that the characters are risen above the baseline

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute Scale = int32(14)

Docs.summary: The scale of the characters. The value is a string representation of a double

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute Size = int32(13)

Docs.summary: The size of the characters.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute Stretch = int32(25)

Docs.summary: The stretch of the text, if set. Values are "ultra_condensed", "extra_condensed", "condensed", "semi_condensed", "normal", "semi_expanded", "expanded", "extra_expanded" or "ultra_expanded"

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute Strikethrough = int32(12)

Docs.summary: "true" or "false" whether the text is strikethrough

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute Style = int32(27)

Docs.summary: The slant style of the text, if set. Values are "normal", "oblique" or "italic"

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute Underline = int32(11)

Docs.summary: "none", "single", "double" or "low"

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute Variant = int32(26)

Docs.summary: The capitalization variant of the text, if set. Values are "normal" or "small_caps"

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute Weight = int32(15)

Docs.summary: The weight of the characters.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.TextAttribute WrapMode = int32(22)

Docs.summary: The wrap mode of the text, if any. Values are "none", "char" or "word"
